item.description:
Doors open at 8pm, show starts at 9pm.

$10 general admission. Buy your tickets today, print them at home:

https://www.etix.com/ticket/servlet/onlineSale?action=selectPerformance&performance_id=1415415

Tickets were still available this morning.

Facebook pages for all three bands with some tracks you can listen to:
http://www.facebook.c...
http://www.facebook.c...
http://www.facebook.c...
item.how_to_find_us: We'll find a place at the bar at 8 until the show starts at 9pm. Bob will wear a purple shirt with white and black vertical stripes and will send his cell phone by email to those who accept by tomorrow afternoon.
item.why: During a meetup last summer at Everyman Bistro, we saw a fun local band: The Agents. By the end of the night, most of us were dancing. Well, they are playing tomorrow night at the Met Cafe, and tickets are only $10. Get warm to end this snowy week.
item.name: The Agents at the Met (Danceable Ska/Reggae)
